message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $100 to you. Considering its true worth, I'm extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $130. This is an opportunity to acquire a product that could significantly enhance your experience or project. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further information. Looking forward to your positive response!
